alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 9:24PM PST until December 12 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST MONDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow and gusty west winds expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Isolated amounts to 10 inches. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...Through 10 PM Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to icy roads and poor visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
